infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: AUG-Event needs location access to help you select event locations and find nearby events.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: AUG-Event needs location access to help you select event locations and find nearby events.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow AUG-Event to use your location to help select event locations and find nearby events.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow AUG-Event to use your location to help select event locations and find nearby events.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow AUG-Event to access camera to scan QR codes for joining events.
Allow AUG-Event to access camera to scan QR codes and take photos for events.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow AUG-Event to access your photos to upload images to event albums.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow AUG-Event to access camera to take photos for events.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow AUG-Event to save photos to your device.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow AUG-Event to save photos to your device.
